did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: World Health Organization.Global Programme on AIDS.

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Statement from the Consultation on AIDS and the workplace / World Health Organization in association with International Labour Office -- Statements by the WHO Collaborating Centres on AIDS: Heterosexual transmission of HIV and HIV and certain common social situations / World Health Organization -- Consensus statement from Consultation on AIDS and sports / World Health Organization in collaboration with International Federation of Sports Medicine -- Joint WHO/UNICEF statement on early immunization for HIV-infected children / World Health Organization in collaboration with United Nations Children's Fund -- Consensus statement from Consultation on sexually transmitted diseases as a risk factor for HIV transmission / World Health Organization Global Programme on AIDS and Programme of STD -- Consensus statement from Consultation on partner notification for preventing HIV transmission / World Health Organization Global Programme on AIDS and Programme of STD -- Statement on AIDS and tuberculosis / World Health Organization Global Programme on AIDS and Tuberculosis Programme in collaboration with International Union Against Tuberculosis and Lung Diseases.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: International Union Against Tuberculosis and Lung Diseases.
Programme of Sexually Transmitted Diseases (World Health Organization)

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: World Health Organization statements, #7775. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
